Html:
Hello,

Is is possible to display some kind of progress bar (or just a small animation) while a module is remotely loaded from the server?


Right now the app kinda freeze while the module is downloaded. I would like to display something to my users.


Any ideas?
Alex

Hi Alex,

The current version of Prism does not provide any out-of-the-box functionality to notify the application the progress of loading modules. This can still be done by creating custom implementations of some classes. The following thread might provide some ideas:

  • ModuleManager Download Progress

After that you can simply use your custom logic, probably making sure the components in charge of showing the progress are loaded first and load the rest of the modules afterwards.

Please let me know if this helps.

Damian Schenkelman
